alert.note: Alert for Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 1:24PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF FLAMING GORGE...SOUTH LINCOLN COUNTY...AND ROCK SPRINGS AND GREEN RIVER COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 122 PM MST, an area of heavy snow was near Granger moving east at 45 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Granger around 125 PM MST. Little America around 135 PM MST. Green River around 155 PM MST. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 65 and 95. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
